details.publicNotes: A grunting moan is the first sign that this corpse has not been set to ease with Soft Whisper. Rising to limbs animated with dark magics, the beast stares from the rotting flesh that is all that remains of its face. It sounds hungry.

description.value: A zombie pony is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and cannot use reactions.

Strike an enemy. On a hit, deal no damage, instead causing @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. On a critical hit, this increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2}. This remains until the end of the zombie's next turn. If another zombie does the same, the slowed increases and the duration resets. At @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 3}, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.
Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg] enemy and deal 5 extra damage as they tear a piece loose to messily devour. They gain 5 temporary hit points.
